resources.string: Goal is to hit as many right words as possible while your partner explains them to you. While explaining you can\'t use the root word or the prohibited words on the bottom of the screen. Every hit is +1 point, every error is -1 point. One game is 4 laps long. First lap first from the team guesses, second lap second from the team, and repeat that one more time. In the end, wins team with biggest score. If it is straightened you play one more lap and than the winner is announced. You have 60sec for one turn. GOOD LUCK!
Do you wanna play again with same teams?
Here goes the winner lap!! Give your best :D
